photos.caption: Tara and I in the afterparty. You can't tell but we were EXHAUSTED at this point.
Somebody (I forget who) made these cool 'smoll notes' of people's talks. Here were the notes for Tara's!
A shot of me giving my talk, 'Formalizing User Rights on the Web'
Tara giving her talk, 'Imagine This: A Web without Servers'
